Text:
Master Shadow, your tea is served. Heheh, I got some
good tea leaves today, so it should be very delicious!

Also, I tried baking cookies for you to eat with your
tea. Here they are.
Thanks.

It was just one word, but seeing his beloved face
light up with satisfaction the moment he smells
the intermingled aromas of tea and cookies
fills Epsilon with delight.

(Aaah... Master Shadow needed my assistance! There is
no replacement for this happiness.)

(Though of course, Master Shadow's usual expression
of dignity and deep intelligence is also dreamy...)

(Outside of his family, I think I am the only one who
sees this face of his, when he is relaxed and free of
worry...isn't that just amazing?!)

(...Did I say family?! Could my very existence be as
close to him as a family member...? Heheh, I feel
kind of embarrassed.)

By the way Master Shadow, what else can I do for you
today? Lady Alpha is away, so—
Right. I needed you, Epsilon.

What...? Needed me? You are finally giving me an
important mission? I am so honored!

(I am not at the same level as Lady Alpha, but my
skills should be good enough. Still, I never receive
important missions at all...)

(At most, all they've asked me is to gather intel far
from the action, or used me as a messenger...
again and again.)

(Of course, it makes me happy to be at the hideout
like this, having so many chances to be with Master
Shadow, but I want to show everyone I can do more.)
(Finally, my time has come!)
That's not it...um, can I have another cup of tea?
Y-Yes, of course!
No denying it, your tea tastes the best.

You honor me. Recently I have been experimenting with
changing the temperature and timing I take the leaves
out, according to where they were grown.

After you've relaxed with tea, how about your usual
massage?
Oh yeah, if you don't mind.

And then after that...we can talk about your mission
for me...
Mission...?

Erm...you just came to drink tea? I-It's okay, just
having you come to see me makes me happy!

(Yes... You came to see me. That makes me happy, but
it's not about a mission...again.)

By the way, your shoulders...are stiff. Are you
perhaps tired, Master Shadow?

Maybe. Every time my sister comes home she pushes me
into sword practice.

You are always busy Master Shadow... I wish I could
help you more.
Aaah...that feels good. You have a healing touch.

Oh, I am happy to hear that! Please let me know
whenever you want a massage, or tea.
I doesn't matter where I am—I will come running!
(But really, I want to be useful in a different way.)

Just when she thinks that they can get some alone
time for a while—
I am back... Oh, Shadow is also here. Perfect.
I-I will get you a cup of tea, Lady Alpha...

My apologies, Epsilon. I have an urgent mission
report for Shadow. Can you leave for a moment?

...Certainly, Lady Alpha. I will be back later,
Master Shadow.

(The words of Lady Alpha, backed by the deep trust of
Master Shadow, are absolute. I can't refuse.)

The moment Epsilon steps out the room she feels upset
and left out, but she can't help listening to their faint
voices through the wall.

Shadow, we discovered something important about the
target of the investigation the other day.

(Tea and massages...I'm always the one closest to
Master Shadow. That in itself makes me proud, but...)

But the Shadow Garden is an organization whose goal
is fighting the Cult of Diablos. In other words, to be
here, you need to be valued for your combat skills.
(And here I am...)

(When it comes to the sword, I can't beat Lady Alpha.
When it comes to pure fighting strength, Delta is in a
league of her own.)

(But I am keeping up with my training. I am getting
stronger, even. If you put me against a normal
magic user I'm sure I can defeat them.)

(Beta is Beta, she goes here and there as Lady
Alpha's assistant.)

(Gamma as well. She's not good at fighting, but she's
an asset to the Shadow Garden with her intelligence,
organizational and managerial skills.)

(Yet I am the only one not put on dangerous missions,
I can't even attend mission reports...)

(I keep asking Lady Alpha. "Let me do more. Let me do
something.")

(She said, "Soon, okay?" I think she is just giving
me the runaround. Maybe she thinks that I'm
not being serious...)

(Maybe I should directly appeal to Master Shadow...
No, no, no. That's completely impossible!)

(Lady Alpha leads the Garden, if I go over her head,
Master Shadow will think I am selfish.)

(I really don't want Master Shadow to think something
like that...but...)

I want to be of more use to Master Shadow, it is
absurd that I am not even given the chance.
...I can do more! I can do it!
...Is that so? Could you tell me more, Epsilon?
Alpha—I mean, Lady Alpha!
N-No, I-I was...

Now, no need to get so upset. It is my job to take in
any complaints in the Shadow Garden. So go ahead.
I-I am not satisfied!

Okay, come with me for a talk in my room...
What is it? Not coming?
...I am.
